numericalExperiment.rationale: Comparison of initialization strategies, since there is at present no generally accepted “best” way to initialize models.
numericalExperiment.description: A repeat of experiment 1.1 using an alternate initialization strategy or alternate initial data. The atmospheric composition (and other conditions) should be prescribed as in the historical run (expt. 3.2) and the RCP4.5 scenario (expt. 4.1) of the long-term suite of experiments. Ocean initial conditions should be in some way representative of the observed anomalies or full fields for the start date. Land, sea-ice and atmosphere initial conditions are left to the discretion of each group. Simulations should be initialized towards the end of 1960, 1965, 1970, 1975, 1980, 1985, 1990, 1995, 2000 and 2005. Calendar start date can be 1st September, 1st November, 1st December or 1st January, according to the convenience of the modeling group. Dates should allow complete years/decades to be analyzed. A minimum ensemble size of 3 should be produced for each start date.

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.ic.non-oc
numericalRequirement.description: Alternative strategy/data to initialise non-ocean conditions

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.ic.oc
numericalRequirement.description: Ocean Initial Conditions must represent in some measure the observed anomolies for the start date used

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.bc.ant_wmg
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of well mixed gases (anthropogenic)

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.bc.volc_wmg
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of well mixed gases (volcanic)

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.bc.sls
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of short lived gas species

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.bc.nat_aer
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of aerosols (natural)

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.bc.ant_aer
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of aerosols (anthropogenic)

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.bc.nat_aer_prec
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of aerosol (natural) precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.bc.ant_aer_prec
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of aerosol (anthropogenic) precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.bc.solar
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing solar forcing

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.bc.land
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing land use

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.bc.NoVolc2005
numericalRequirement.description: No volcanic aerosol emissions beyond 2005

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.bc.seaice
numericalRequirement.description: Sea ice observations forcing (unless modelled) must precede start date of simulation

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.bc.rcp45_wmg
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of RCP4.5 well mixed gases, including CO2

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.bc.rcp45_sls
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of RCP4.5 short lived gas species

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.bc.rcp45_aer
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of RCP4.5 aerosols

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.bc.rcp45_aer_pre
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations or emissions of RCP4.5 aerosol precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.bc.rcp45_LU
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing RCP4.5 land use

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.bc.volc_aer_conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed constant background volcanic aerosol

numericalExperiment.longName: 1.5 decadal 10 year hindcast/forecast utilizing alternative initializations.

numericalRequirement.name: 1.5.stc.decadal_10yr
numericalRequirement.description: Run for 10 years
